text: 1.27: Ro 9.23; 2 Ko 2.14; Ef 1.18; 3.8; 1 T 1.1Fhe Bakɨme wo vuzvugara, ana mba zorga ki buneŋ, ana nen nza guigira Zisas khothɨgi, ana nen nza khɨvigi. Ana maaŋ muuŋgim, nza kaŋgi mba buneŋ, ne guigira buna vhuueŋ ma, ne za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigir kurkurarga. Mba zorga ki buneŋ khaŋ muuŋgi, Krais nde phorga ki. Ana nde ndigirim, nde ŋgɨp, ana phorgɨ kɨv, ana bigir vhuuiŋ nde Hevenan nta ndirga, nde nen rarga ki.
